FuncDef: The uninstall application-software command uninstalls an image software package. The uninstall application-software command uninstalls an image software package.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the image software package to be uninstalled.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Examples: Warning: The application software package oas1234567890.zip will be uninstalled. Continue? [Y/N]:Y
ExtraInfo: After OAS is enabled, you can run this command to uninstall the image software package.
